description.ko: 네온 빛, 비, 그리고 금속성 도시 질감의 상호작용을 포착한 낭만적인 미래 도시 장면입니다.
description.en: A romanticized futuristic city scene capturing the interplay of neon light, rain, and metallic urban textures.

prompt: A low-angle cinematic view of a rain-drenched cyberpunk megacity canyon, featuring a massive holographic dragon weaving through rusted metal skyscrapers. The scene is saturated with #FF00FF and #00FFFF neon reflections in hyper-realistic asphalt puddles. Textures of wet carbon fiber and glowing #FF6B35 holographic signage. 8k, Unreal Engine 5, raytracing. Deep volumetric fog, dramatic light spill from high-density urban structures, and a romantic digital atmosphere with a sharp focus on individual rain droplets hitting metallic surfaces.
